text: Introducing the President of the United States … Slim Shady?! After Eminem tore into Donald Trump with a savage freestyle rap, HollywoodLife. com has the EXCLUSIVE scoop on whether or not he ’ ll ‘ pull a Kanye ’ and run for office! In a world where a real estate mogul / former reality television star can be elected to the highest office in the land, the idea of Eminem, 44, launching a presidential bid isn ’ t that farfetched. Some fans were hoping Em ( born Marshall Mathers ) would declare his candidacy after he lyrically demolished President Donald Trump, 71, at the start of the 2017 BET Hip - Hop Awards. “ Eminem is very happy that his take down of Trump is getting so much attention,
